snippet.title: Sign Up Now to Join the Playtest on March 15th | Warborne Above Ashes
snippet.description:
🔥 Warborne Above Ashes: First Playtest Trailer - Reserve Your Spot on Steam Today! 🔥  

In the ruins of a huge empire that once thrived on the power of Exergy, only the strongest survive. In Warborne Above Ashes, the sci-fi faction-based war MMO is opening its gates for the first playtest, and you’re invited to join the chaos!  

📅 Apply Now for the Playtest on March 15th – Mark your calendars and prepare for an all-out faction war like no other. Sign up NOW on Steam to secure your place in the first wave of Commanders!  

⚔️ Choose Your Faction – Will you fight for glory, power, or survival? The choice is yours.  
💥 Forge Your Legacy – Team up, strategize, and dominate the battlefield in this epic clash of factions.  

👉 How to Join: 
1. Head to Steam and search for Warborne Above Ashes.  
2. Click [Request Access] to reserve your spot for the playtest.  
3. Be ready to dive into the action on March 15th!  

Don’t miss your chance to be part of the first wave of players to experience Warborne Above Ashes. The war begins soon—will you answer the call?  

#WarborneAboveAshes #Playtest #MMO #FactionWar #steam 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3142050/_/
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/EUXk2zVFnV
